cause.description:
THIS CAUSE IS TO BE ABLE TO DISTRIBUTE EDUCATIONAL MATERIALS ON CERVICAL CANCER TO OUR YOUNG WOMAN SO THAT THEY CAN KNOW THE IMPORTANCE OF BEING RESPONSIBLE WHEN IT COMES TO POSITIVE PAP SMEAR TEST AND ALSO TEACH THE IMPORTANCE OF GETTING ANNUAL CHECK UPS THE MAJORITY OF OUR YOUNG WOMEN TODAY TAKE THE CERVICAL CANCER ISSUES LIGHTLY UNTIL IT HITS CLOSE TO HOME OR HITS EVEN THEM AND I WOULD LIKE TO TAKE A PLEDGE TO PROPERLY INFORM OUR YOUNG WOMEN OF THIS GROWING PROBLEM IN THE U.S
1. CERVICAL CANCER IS KILLING OUR YOUNG WOMEN
cause.mission: EDUCATE OUR YOUNG WOMAN ON CERVICAL CANCER
cause.name: CERVICAL CANCER
